mapper.select: SELECT * FROM shipping_contract WHERE container_no=#{containerNo} AND DATE_SUB(packing_time, INTERVAL 30 DAY)

SELECT shipping_contract_no,logistics_contract_no,expenses,payment_count,payment_time, finance_staff,cashier,principal,packing_time,packing_location,unpacking_factory, container_no,seal_no,tally_clerk,tally_clerk_price,departure_fleet,departure_price, carrier_company_name,carrier_company_price,destination_port_fleet,destination_port_price FROM shipping_contract WHERE payment_time between #{startDate} and #{endDate} ORDER BY payment_time

SELECT shipping_contract_no,logistics_contract_no,expenses,payment_count,payment_time, finance_staff,cashier,principal,packing_time,packing_location,unpacking_factory, container_no,seal_no,tally_clerk,tally_clerk_price,departure_fleet,departure_price, carrier_company_name,carrier_company_price,destination_port_fleet,destination_port_price FROM shipping_contract HAVING date_format(payment_time, '%Y-%m') between #{startDate} and #{endDate} ORDER BY date_format(payment_time, '%Y-%m')
